distance.description: The linear distance to move forward.

acceleration.description: Optional acceleration value for forward motion.

distance.description: The linear distance to move backward.

acceleration.description: Optional acceleration value for backward motion.

commands.name: left
commands.description: Strafe left using mecanum wheels (lateral movement, not rotation).

distance.description: The linear distance to strafe left.

acceleration.description: Optional acceleration value for left strafe motion.

commands.name: right
commands.description: Strafe right using mecanum wheels (lateral movement, not rotation).

distance.description: The linear distance to strafe right.

acceleration.description: Optional acceleration value for right strafe motion.

angle.description: The angle to rotate in radians. Positive for counter-clockwise (left), negative for clockwise (right) if direction is not specified, otherwise follows direction.

direction.description: The direction to rotate the robot.

acceleration.description: Optional angular acceleration for rotation in rad/s^2.

The parameter value is outside the acceptable range (if range limits are defined).
The unit inferred from the input does not match the expected unit after conversion attempts.
An unexpected error occurred during command processing.
